post: MyImpact Challenge celebrates students who take action to make a difference in their communities. This national civic engagement program highlights service projects that address real-world challenges, showcasing the impact young leaders can have. Learn more about the initiative,  https://lnkd.in/eExWq2tj  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #MyImpactChallenge

"As a teacher, I have found the Bill of Rights Institute to be an invaluable resource… I have seen, first-hand, the confidence in my students abilities increase drastically." Donna Vitek, Liberty Tutors. Support teachers and students like these by donating to the Bill of Rights Institute today. Your gift ensures access to free, high-quality resources that make a real difference in classrooms across the nation. As we enter a new year and kick off the countdown to our nations 250th birthday, the Bill of Rights Institute invites you to celebrate and commemorate events throughout American history with us. Read more below.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #A250

Federal, state, or localwho's responsible? Teach students how the U. S. Constitution divides power between levels of government with our interactive lesson, "Which Level of Government Can Solve This Problem?" Great for real-world problem-solving discussions! BRI Scholarship Recipient Mary DiFiore-Smith feels that social studies teachers carry the responsibility of telling as many stories as possible  especially the hard ones. Read to learn more about how Mary discovered her "why" and used it to help students find theirs in history.  https://lnkd.in/ehB67dDi

Discover Andrew Carnegies inspiring journey from immigrant to industrial leader, and explore how immigrants shaped American culture, built communities, and drove innovation like the steam engine and telegraph. BRIs elementary lessons bring history to life with primary sources, content-area literacy, and performance-based assessments. Perfect for grades 3-5, they help young learners explore the roots of modern America and the principles of citizenship. Start exploring today,  https://lnkd.in/ebT7rAVb  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #BRIJr

Celebrate America's 250th with BRI! Join the Bill of Rights Institute as we explore and honor the Founding principles that built our nation 250 years ago. Sign up for inspiring stories from America's history, resources to engage students, and ways to celebrate this historic anniversary. Let's reflect and celebrate together.  https://lnkd.in/eCNQzkZM

Federal Employees & Retirees! Time is running out to make a difference ! Support the Bill of Rights Institute through the Combined Federal Campaign (CFC) and help us provide free, high-quality civic education resources to students and teachers nationwide. Give Knowledge this season and GIVE HAPPY using CFC code 36265.

Jan. 15 is the final day to make your pledge through the CFC. If you havent already pledged, start your new year off with a gift that will keep on giving all year long – a recurring payroll deduction – and GIVE HAPPY to one or more charities that you care about at GiveCFC.org. Just $5 per paycheck can have a huge impact!  #GiveCFC
